    • Method Detail

      • checkThresholdCombination

        public boolean checkThresholdCombination(VaultEntryType GenericType,
                                         FilterType availabledatatype,
                                         FilterType TH)
        Checks if the given parameters are a valid combination, which means GenericType and TH or availabledatatype and TH belong to the same Type-group.

        Example:

        checkThresholdCombination(BASAL_PROFILE, BASAL_AVAILABLE, BASAL_TH)

        checkThresholdCombination(BASAL_PROFILE, BG_AVAILABLE, BASAL_TH)

        checkThresholdCombination(CGM_AVAILABLE, BASAL_AVAILABLE, BASAL_TH)

        all return TRUE, whereas

        checkThresholdCombination(BOLUS_NORMAL, BASAL_AVAILABLE, GLUCOSE_CGM_ALERT)

        returns FALSE

        Parameters:
        GenericType - the VaultEntryType of the entry to be filtered
        availabledatatype -
        TH -
        Returns:
        boolean

      • filter

        public FilterResult filter(java.util.List<VaultEntry> data)

        Check if the given List of VaultEntrys matches the criteria of the Filter.
